I like customer service like that, plus as u r sitting there eating the guy that waited on us came over and asked us if we were good and if we needed anything. That amazing service. The best part the food is soooo good and the drinks r tooooooo.

What can I say about Greens and Proteins?? I can tell you always been fan and this marks the third location in Vegas. I can tell you that every location the food has been spot on. They have a nice diversity of healthy options, whole create your own menu section, options for smoothies really enjoy, and never had bad meal. I ended up getting the Turkey Club Wrap with tofu fries. I think might have been the first time getting wrap. The best parts about it was instead of the normal wrap went with the spinach wrap. Talk about giving the wrap not only different flavor and look! I thought was prefect compliment for the whole dish. It had ample amount of turkey and love the dressing mixed in with the greens some fresh tomato. It nice size wrap one that filling. The tofu fries. Fried tofu especially hard tofu. Beautiful thing. It not only healthier but taste better then fries, Not at all greasy. It crispy on the outside and soft on the inside. I could order whole basket of fries if I cold. The seasoning they out on the tofu is addicting.

You can tell not only from the sign that just opened plus get first review. LOL! It feels new, smells new, and things that tradition with the signage and logo. I believe this is the only location that the menu its electronic. I know the smoothies looked even more tasty. It rolls over couple times or least once. Each time keep showing different smoothie on the menu. It making me thirsty waiting or thinking about what am going order for lunch. I like the menu. They sell different nutrition bars Q-West bars to couple other brands. The cucumber water nice touch. Me not really fan of but hear it not only healthy but not many places that offer it. I would say probably about the same size as the other two locations. 

The service nothing but five stars for me. They greeted us right after entering, offered help with the menu if needed it, friendly, and love the positive vibes. The best part about third location is super close to the house. So now truly if ever need Greens and Proteins fix literally bike down the street or five min drive. Nice option too have in life!! =))))

BBQ chicken pizza. This is the second most popular dish according to the server so I figured why not. 

I'm not sure how healthy it is, but it tasted like a regular pizza or one you might get at CPK (California Pizza Kitchen). I'm not a huge fan of CPK or anything, but maybe the flavors reminded me of it. 

Service was amazing!!!!!!

I don't think that healthy should necessarily = expensive. I've had better for cheaper. I can make better for cheaper. 

I went here after a workout. I got the Ahi Tuna salad which was okay. The lettuce was crunchy and the avocado was creamy, but I think the mushrooms overpowered the whole dish. I thought it would be a "hot" salad instead of the cold salad thinking they would have seared the tuna last and give it to me. My bad on assuming that though. 

The Green smoothie I got was good, but didn't think it was worth about $8. 

The size of this place is decent. It's very clean and I liked that they bring the food to you. The staff was friendly, until I looked at the menu to make my decision, then the he stopped paying attention to me to talk to another staff.

My favorite place for healthy food after I go to the gym. Everything here is the highest quality. Check out the Greek scramble if you want a great meal for under $7. Would highly recommend trying this place out.
My favorite everyday restaurant! Healthy, delicious and friendly staff. Changed the way I eat

First time trying this location now that I work on this side of town. My absolute favorite is still the tofu fries. Love them! They come in 6-piece and 12-piece orders. 

This location is smaller so it feels more crowded, but I came during lunch time so it was definitely a full house. 

As you walk in, to your left is where the line starts and they have physical menus as well as menus on their TV. 

All the green in the place gives me a nice vibe for some reason, just looks nice aesthetically. 

Green shake is a bundle of health; it tastes okay but at least it's healthy, right?

Their pizza is good last I recall but when I'm here, the last thing I want is a pizza, ya know?

A great spot to grab lunch/dinner with your friends who are looking for healthy options. I've been here twice and really enjoyed it. First time I ordered the bison cheese steak and the second time I ordered the bison burger. Both dishes were absolutely delicious. Their tofu fries reminded me of a tofu dish you can get at any Chinese restaurants, which I really liked. They serve cucumber water and often walk around with smoothie samples for customers to try. Their customer service is excellent and I will be back to try their other options such as salads and create-your-own-meal dishes!

Love this place! I'm glad they opened up a spot closer to where I live. Usually I'd have to drive to the one on eastern and it's always busy. At least here it's not too crazy yet. I usually just get the turkey burger with jicama fries . Soooo tasty and my husband loves the bbq chicken pizza. The staff is always on point with their customer service. Definitely recommend this place!

This is becoming the favorite place for "Lunch Days" with my staff!
If you are in the mood for an awesome salad, or even a healthy burger, this place will hook you up!  Have been for both lunches and brunches. Never disappointed! 

Tons of yummy healthy options on the menu. The Jicama "fries" are amazing!! And I love the bison burgers, I go back and forth on the jicama fries or the tofu fries, they are both so good, in completely different ways. The egg dishes are light, and tasty. I have never had a smoothie from here, but I see them making them like crazy, so I assume they are a local favorite.

There is a reason why this company has different locations popping up around the city.
Once people discover it, they love it! Don't miss out!!

The staff is very friendly, and I love the atmosphere! 

You have to try the tofu fries and any of the pizzas!!

They also have exotic meets like ostrich and bison burgers! 

Mm mm try the cucumber lemon water.

I have been to this place numerous times in the past and I never got the chance to review this place. Greens and Proteins never dissatisfied my visit, all of their food and smoothies are great. My favourite is the Chocolate Veggiechino, the best stuff to get through your morning in a good mood! Also the Tofu Fries are a must-have too!
This time I decided to order the Granola French Toast, which is fantastic and don't be fooled by the small portions. After 4 small toasts it really filled you up.

This place was nice enough, and the staff was really friendly. The food was just ok. I ordered the create your own entrée with veggies and brown rice. I asked if I could have extra veggies instead of tofu for the protein, while they obliged, It didn't seem like enough veggies to really be comparable to having meat or tofu so I had thought maybe they would have put a bit more than they did. I could have easily cooked that at home for around 3 bucks on the high end. So paying 10 dollars for that was not worth it. Giving the third star for customer service as both employees I interacted with were really nice.

The location is a bit isolated from the center/strip but overall great to get away from the norm and people. The teriyaki chicken pizza is good but the chicken tasted a bit old; the breakfast yogurt needs more gogurt if felt like cereal with no milk. the girls at the counter were amazing. Bathrooms smell good and the location detailed cleaned.

A coworker recommended this place to me so I decided to give it a try today, definitely worth the trip! Had a small rough cut with chicken, yummy! Perfect size, too! Will be a normal lunch spot from now on. Try it, you won't be disappointed!!
Great place to get a high quality protein and carb meal. Highly recommend. Smoothies are amazing too.

Fantastic!

We had accidentally came across this place I caught a quick glimpse as we were driving to the gym and immediately decided to go here after our work out for lunch after looking at the menu and seeing bison and ostrich! 

I had the ostrich burger and my boyfriend had the bison burger each with a side of jicama fries. It was so good we didn't even talk during our meal! We were totally glued and hypnotized by our meal!

The cucumber lemon water is delicious and fresh. 

My boyfriend had the straight to the heart juice (lowest calorie option) and boy was the probably one of the best unique juices I have tried in a long time!

This place is so good and healthy they aren't afraid to publish any of their calories from the meals to juices to even the sauces. This is extremely helpful for us as we count calories and are very strict with our intake. 

We will be back and are looking forward to trying different things on the menu (however it'll be hard to stray away from the straight to the heart juice)

The management and employees are excellent. The place is clean and has a very nice feel for it. It's quiet and bright. Great for a quick lunch by yourself, business lunch, date with your significant other, even a dinner! Highly recommend!!

See you soon!!
Absolutely delicious and consistent. Will continue to go again & again. Anything bison here is on point lol

Update on my last review. The owner Patrick replied to my review and invited me back in to make it right and discuss my visit. He was super nice and knowledgeable! The employees were really nice this time around! Food and smoothies  tasted awesome and super healthy for you! My son and I each had the build your own with chicken and broccoli and he got rice and I got quinoa. He had teriyaki sauce and I had 1 teriyaki
1 spicy peanut and 1 pesto. They were all great!
My daughter being a teenager had the buffalo chicken lol! She enjoyed it! Me & my son split the juice called the Malibu breeze it was yummy & full of nutritious things our body needs! Great experience this time around! We will be back! Patrick is awesome! If only all business owners could work there business all day lol!

When we arrived we were second in line. We ordered a wrap, 2 wellness drinks and a child's pasta. Our drinks came out fast but it was over a half hour for our food. The food was ok but they messed up our order, we were charged 1.50 for avocado that they forgot to put in the wrap. Overall the food was good but overpriced. Their smoothies are $8-$10 and service is slow. 

The girl who took our order was rude and very short with us. Sad to say it this will be my last trip here.

I heard about this place on Groupon and decided to check their menu out online.  I noticed they have bison burger and since I've been dying to try it, I thought this would be a perfect opportunity.   I was not disappointed!  Their bison burger is so juicy, like literally dripping out.  It could use a tad more salt, but other than that I love it.  I've been here several times and this is all I ever get.  The service is fast and always made to order.  It smells great there too. Very clean and fresh.

The location I go to is near my job and they share a parking lot in a business plaza with several other restaurants and a Starbucks.  It can be pretty congested during lunch time, but when you have bison on your mind none of that even matters.  Love this place!

Yummy, healthy and clean tasting food. It is so nice to have a place like Greens and Proteins near my office! Online ordering was fast, easy and my food was ready to go when I arrived. Definitely recommend!

This place was great! DANIEL helped us out. I've never been here before and got a chicken wrap I wasn't too fond of and I'm not the type to send anything back because I am just really  picky . But Dan reassured me that it's ok and got me the bison burger which was delicious !  Customer service and staff is great here! Very friendly and clean!!!

Everything thing I've tried here has been delicious... The greek scramble, french toast, bison wrap, & now the turkey club with avocado added to it. It's all delicious this place should be on every corner around the city.
I got the vegan RAW nachos and a smoothie and it was ALL SO BOMB and FRESH and plated gorgeously. The menu is huge and it was very satisfying.
Went to this location for the first time and I must say the customer service is excellent along with their healthy food :)

I love this place!  The food is scrumptious!  The vegan pizza is delicious.  I love the cucumber water and the amazing juices.  I like to go here for lunch, and that is one of the only drawbacks.  It is insanely busy sometimes and hard to find a table, especially when people sit and chat at length after they have finished eating.  A lot of day working people use this as a lunch destination, so it's a bit annoying at times. The service is great, though.  Even at the busiest times, they are timely with the food.  The other detail I'm not crazy about is the kale salad.  Since it's mature kale, it's a bit tough, and it would be nice if they used baby kale or chopped it up a bit more.  Also, sometimes the dressing is a bit lip-pursing and sour.
Amazing customer service. Ask for Steve-o . Try there bison steak wrap and ask for the House bbq sauce
For healthy low calorie food, it is delicious! The customer service from employees is outstanding!
I enjoy this restaurant. The veggie burger and sweet potato fries are great. You'll get full from earring at this restaurant. The customer service is also excellent.

Used to be my favorite lunch and healthy spot until I found a staple in my drink! Ahh! So upsetting! I used to go 3-4 times a week but haven't been back since the staple incident. I let them know and all they did was make me a new one but I was honestly too Afraid to drink it. Oh well! They stay busy! The food is pretty good! Just can't stomach the staple.
Love this place.  I come here after a work out at Vegas hot.  My favorite is the chicken salad yummy
I didn't feel guilty eating this meal after my work out. Got a chicken cabbage wrap with a Portobello mushroom. The mushroom had an amazing taste. I could eat this all day.
Service is always awesome at this location. Delicious and fresh food every time. Acai berry smoothie is a must and lawash flatbread veggie pizza w/daiya cheese. So. Delicious!!

What can I say except for healthy can be good! It's about time I try to get a hold on my health and Protein and Greens provide a great variety of food and drinks to help you on your journey. 

Menu item are kinda pricey as expected but it's not cheap to feel and look good. But you can either pay now for healthy food option or later with your health. 

Regardless if you do try them out you won't be disappointed. I order the Cali Wrap with spinach tortilla and no added avocado but the whole meal with tofu fries was under 300 cal. What? Unheard of. The wrap was big filled with yummy grilled chick a bit dry but flavorful. Tofu fries was crispy and on point I didn't miss the potato. I got the green shake with almond milk which was good and creamy. They also have awesome cucumber lemon water which was refreshing. 

All that was $19.99 like I said a bit pricey for one meal but worth every penny.  The staff was super friendly and the restaurant was uber hip. I'm a new fan and will come back for more!

Very impressed!! If you are looking for a satisfying healthy meal or smoothies & juices with great customer service, this is your place!! Even though we arrived about 30 minutes before closing, we were still treated like "priority". We were never "rushed" and the food was made and served fresh!!! The entire staff was warm and friendly!!!

I love the healthy options available to vegetarians & non-vegetarians. I eat meat so the fact that they offer great tasting burgers in bison and Angus is great!! 
I had the Choco-Banana Smoothie...sinfully delicious without the "guilt"!! They add kale, spinach & avocado which "works" with the rest of the traditional ingredients (chocolate, banana and peanut butter)

I ordered the Angus burger with avocado and cheddar cheese, which was perfectly cooked & juicy!! The sweet potato fries were good n crispy!!

Steve-o not only treated us to great customer service, but gave my friend and I tasting samples of the acai smoothie, walnut pesto sauce with crackers to dip with and refreshing cucumber water!! 

Greens n Proteins...you won a returning customer & a fan!!! Delicious and nutritious!!

I would have appreciated if the guy behind the counter last night would have told me that the broccoli cheese soup contains raw cashews in it as its base. After being in the emergency room for 5 hours last night because of a serious nut allergic reaction, I called this morning to find out the ingredients of my meal after the fact. What a miserable experience. Thanks Greens & Protiens.

I love this place because of their awesome crew! Shout out to Blake and Steven for always being so friendly and accommodating! 

I have never been to the other locations before but I have grown to love this one since it is closer to where I live now. It is also not too far from Planet Fitness on Rainbow and 215 so this is definitely my favorite go to place for my post-workout meals. I've been to this location four times already and the food is fresh and delicious every time. 

They offer a wide selection of meals, protein shakes and smoothies. If you are watching your calorie intake, this place is great. They have low calorie pizzas and burgers!  I will definitely recommend this place if you are looking for delicious and healthy food.

I go to greens and proteins 2-3x a week on the Decatur. Location. So since I was working in this area today  I thought to myself let me just grab some lunch from greens and proteins since I know what I like already. So I order my usual which is a teriyaki sandwich and sweet potato fries. I open it in the car cause I was starving and their sweet potato fries are usually so hot,crispy, and delish but this time I grab one and its just wet and soggy and limp.   Anyways I have hope and I'm like maybe it's a one off situation but nope when I get to my desk 5 mins later  and open my food all my fries are wet and soggy and my sandwich was broken and a mushy mess. (Mind you I didn't even pick it up still and this never happened at the Decatur location.) this was super disappointing especially since I spend a few extra bucks for quality. If it wasn't about health and quality I would just give my business elsewhere. Therefore as of now I'll stick to eating here when I'm around the Decatur location because I have been their consistently and have not had a bad experience.
This place is amazing. Staff are very friend. Food are excellent quality and prices are very reasonable! Try this place if you're looking for a satisfying healthy meal.
This place is outstanding. Price, service, quality, taste are all 100% top notch. I'd eat here three times a day if I were a LV resident.

Great service: happy and patient hostesses and chefs.
Truly healthy food, and delivered fast!
Does it cost more than the average fast dining, of course, but you get way more nutritional value and the taste is fantastic.
I had a bison plate with broccoli, avocado, and walnut cilantro pesto. Delicious!
My girlfriend had the grilled turkey breast plate with broccoli, portobello mushroom, and the walnut cilantro pesto. She raved about it!
We split a Green Leaf Berry Blast smoothie which tasted just right and was loaded with fruits and veggies!

I never write reviews, but this is the third time I've been to this place and so far I love it! The staff is always so nice and welcoming, they make you feel so comfortable. Their enthusiasm is genuine and they're always so helpful and the food is so good. Great Job guys keep up the good work!

I want to support this place because there are few easy healthy options in the area, but when it takes 15-20 minutes for $5 oatmeal in the morning and are late for work because of it, I can't justify coming back. I don't fully blame the guy working because he might have been understaffed,  but everyone else seemed to get their food on time. Oh well.

A definite must go when I'm in Vegas! Staff is always friendly! Love their tofu fries and their French toast is AWESOME! Their green shake and wellness drink are my favorite beverages! BBQ chicken pizza on lavash is DELICIOUS! I wish they opened one in San Diego!!!!
Great food and service. Generous proportions... Thank you Greens and Proteins!

This place is amazing for people on a macro diet! Not only are most of the meals on "my fitness pal" but they also have a chart which they will share the information with you if you ask. The staff is always friendly and always remembers my name. The food is reliable and tastes the same every time I order the dish. My favorite is the Greek scramble or the build your own meal option.
Obviously a healthy place to eat but jeeeeeeez -us, like waiting for dial up internet connection waiting on the food
I gave their other locations 4 stars just because it was filled with annoying gym people but this location is great and has normal people too. Great service super yummy food and juice.

Delicious and healthy are a rare combination, but Greens and Proteins nails it! The service here is also top notch. I enjoyed a lean angus burger perfectly cooked medium served with savory tofu fries and a pickle. Steve-O served me and was incredibly attentive and generous! Now, I'm sure this doesn't happen often, but he offered me a trio of smoothie samples to try and two free smoothies! He also brought some bbq sauce to accompany my burger and my utensils to my table. Great value, so yummy, and guilt-free. Greens and Proteins is healthy eating must!

Had the pleasure of trying this location out today for the first time. Got my order to go, staff member was very friendly and very diligent. Nothing short of great in that department. 

The "Greens and Proteins Breakfast Wrap" w/ Spinach Wrap- it lacked a little on the flavor, and was surprisingly messy. Couldn't say that I was a fan, and no amount of tofu fries could make up for this dish. 

The "Southwest Tofu & Chorizo Burrito" w/ Spinach wrap - this burrito was a good one. The flavor is amazing all the while not as messy as one would have expected. A good mix of ingredients overall making the tofu really blend in. 

As always the tofu fries are the best part. 

"Green Ginger Limeade" - very fresh and refreshing, could practically taste each individual ingredient. 

 "Watermelon Strawberry Cocktail" - not as refreshing as I would've expected, the strawberries tasted almost like preserved ones. Maybe just not as good in comparison to the "Green Ginger Limeade"

First time to Greens and Proteins after wanting to go for like forever and it exceeded my expectations!! I got the wellness juice, which was refreshing and great, and then blueberry cream cheese crepes that were just so amazing and delicious!! Can't wait to go back and try something else!! Staff was super friendly and helped me pick my meal, which I really appreciated!

If I could eat this everyday, I would. But it's a little on the pricey side so wishful thinking. I always order the Build Your Own Meal. You choose your protein, grains, vegetable and a sauce. I usually order the chicken $9.99 or the salmon $12.99 and I would get quinoa and kale. Portions are great for lunch or dinner. Pretty good portion control ratio too might I add.

I love eating here....I feel very "clean and happy" afterwards...if that makes sense. =)

We had a great experience with food we could actually feel great about while traveling which in my book is far better than good. 
 We also had exceptional customer service by the manager, his name was Daniel and after he found out we has food sensitivities he was especially accommodating!

I have been waiting for this location to open up since the announcement earlier this year! I was so thrilled when they finally opened because it is near my work. I was unaware of the opening and luckily my coworker called to ask to see when they opened and luckily enough, it just happened to be the day when they had the soft opening.

I have been working in the food and beverage industry for a few years and I know how things work when a restaurant opens up. It has only been a couple of weeks since this location opened up and I have to say that they have been doing a great job accommodating to the clientele, This location is near a business center where major companies are located including: William Hill, Hakkassan and multiple law firms and physician firms. This location is busy! It may not be near a gym unlike the other two locations, but it is still pretty busy. I am impressed with the way the staff is working so hard to maintain great service for a new spot that has barely opened for less than a month. I have to give a shout out to Daniel and the rest of the team who constantly give their best to making a great dining experience!

I have been to the other locations and I have to say that the serving size in the location seems more than the other two. I feel like I am actually getting my money's worth here! I love building my own menu or ordering the food from the menu. The service, the food and the quality is consistent from the other two locations. There has never been a bad experience with me from the food or service. I am very happy that there is finally a location near where I live and where I work!

So far, this location is working very hard for a business to open up less than a month. Service is great, food tastes delicious and is consistent throughout. I know I will continuously go here!

Groupon Alert! $6 for $12 - for this location and their Flamingo location (adding date for relevance: 9/05/15)

I've been here twice to date -- once for a coworker lunch and again on a solo breakfast trip. I'm a fan of their Flamingo location since I'm trying to trim down and eat clean. I like coming here since this spot gives me options to choose from outside of ordering salads. On my last trip, I ordered their Green Ginger Limeade (green grapes, spinach, ginger, lime, and opted out of the addition of Stevia). I make green smoothies at home and haven't thought of this combo. It's naturally sweet and green grapes and ginger tone down the addition of spinach. It's a quick and tasty way to get your fruits and veggies in.  I loved the blend of flavors and strong ginger kick. 

This spot isn't just for smoothies or fresh juices. They offer up a health conscious menu - sandwiches, wraps, pizzas, burgers, salads and more clean eating grub. I've sampled their bison burger and chicken satay in the past and both have  been tasty options. The have a prime Southwest location and may be found within the shopping center (same one as Starbucks, Cracked Egg and Archie's) on the corner of Sunset and S. Rainbow.  I really enjoy having the option of grabbing a nutritious treat around the corner from our office. My coworkers and I have secured this spot as part of our lunch rotation. 


.

I am a regular at this location, but the last couple of times I've been here the chicken has been really overcooked and honestly tasted disgusting. Just seems like a waste of money when you're paying for it to be extra with your salad. I would however recommend the wellness drink and their smoothies.
Food is always great, but called order for SALAD 30 minutes ago and it's still not ready.
So delicious !!! Very happy they opened a location close to me . GREAT crew and yummy options for meat eaters, vegetarians, and vegans !

I was really surprised of how good Greens and Proteins is. I had never been there,  but after my first visit I'll be going there often.  Service was fantastic as was the food.  I had an Ahi Protein Salad and it was absolutely great.

I love the spot! The bison burger is super delicious and very juicy, which is not easy to do for bison. Manager is very nice and always great service. Smoothies are good and this is a welcome healthy food option for this area. So many offices in this area and tons of horrible restaurants. I work in the area so it's nice to have somewhere to go for lunch work I have many healthy options. I meet people here for lunch meetings all the time.

A friend and I visited here after a long day out in Death Valley.  We were tired and starving! I had the black bean burger (fantastic!), with tofu fries, and the acai blueberry smoothie.  Everything I had was delicious, and I devoured it.  My friend had the sweet potato fries - good, but I was glad I got the tofu fries (I'm a lifelong vegetarian, so I love tofu!).  The food is good and the people who work there are super nice.  Will be coming back here again.  = )

This greens and proteins was probably the best! Steve helped a lot when it came to choosing what I wanted! He was so happy and excited to assist! And that's what is gonna make me come back! Thanks Steve you definitely have me coming back!!

Just stopped in here because I like the named Greens and Protiens HEALTHY KITCHEN AND JUICD BAR even on BEAT THE IRISH week.  The menu is extensive selection of healthy choices.  My favorite is all the calorie intake information for transparency on what it is you are actually eating.  I would come back again this place is tasty indeed.

Ordered acai bowl and this really a joke!!
See my photos you will realize that you are paying for nothing! It cost 8$ for less the 3 slices of strawberry 1 blue berry and 4-5 slices of bananas!!
It's not even organic ! Why $8???!? The acai is sorbet and not real 100% acai- you can tell because the sorbet is sweet so they added sweetener into it,
If you ever tested real acai fruit you probably know that's it's not sweet.
Literally there is nothing here that worth more then a $1.50!!!
Beside that I don't understand what is all about how all the items in the menu can be healthy if they NOT ORGANIC?!!?!?

After a workout, I wanted something clean and easy to I decided to come here! I've never tried it before but it's so close to my box that I figured "now is the perfect time!" 

Upon walking in, the employees are super nice and the restaurant is extremely clean and simple. The menu is placed on the wall and there's also paper menus as well. I wanted to try their jicama fries and their tofu fries and a bunch of my friends recommended that I try the drinks as well!

Their jicama fries have a nice crunch to them and not too much spice or seasoning so I added lime juice to it but next time, I think I'll add chili to it to give it a little kick. The tofu fries were delicious!! Nice and crispy on the outside and soft on the inside- definitely not starchy like potatoes but they were good. The seasoning on the outside of the fries was delicious! It wasn't too salty or too spicy or anything but just right. The strawberry watermelon drink I had had a scoop of protein in it and it made it into a creamy shake- perfect as a dessert and a way to get fruits and protein into my body after the workout. Stephan had the margarita pizza and it was delicious too. The crust was nice and crispy and the sauce and cheese to pizza ratio was on point. 

Price wasn't too bad, the 6 pieces of tofu fries are $2.00 and the plateful of jicama fries are $4.00. Not bad considering I don't have to chop and peel to eat jicama. My smoothie drink was I think $5.99 but I added whey protein so it was an extra dollar. Not too bad for clean eating food.

All in all, we will definitely be coming back here more often!!

Horrible customer service. I was completely ignored, as the staff talked to themselves, so I gave them a couple minutes while I stood there. Eventually, I left and went to another business. Normally I would give a new business the benefit of the doubt, but I was the only customer there and didn't even get a friendly hello. Probably won't be going back.

This place is perfect for anyone on a low carb (or healthy carb) diet. Not only did I enjoy my meal, everything everybody else was eating seemed appealing. 
Can't wait for this model to grow so we can have something like Greens and Proteins in Reno.

The owners reached out to me within hours of my previous post.
Mr. Haggerty took the time to meet me at a location convenient to me & explained how he is using my incident as a training tool.
I'm very impressed with the response and appreciate the passion he puts into this business.
It's good food and I'm glad I get to continue to enjoy healthy food away from home.
Try the bison... lean, mean and delicious.

I've lost 11 pounds now in 25 days and this place has really helped in curving my cravings and still allowing my to eat clean and healthier!!! I've had the bbq chicken pizza and the burgers here which are very tasty! The sweet potatoes fries are to die for! I highly recommend coming here. Been here 5 times now!!

What I love: The Veggie wrap on spinach with tofu fries and a banana tofu smoothie. I have been squeezing in a trip to this location after yoga and it is perfect every time. This is a meal that is enjoyable without fail time and time again. If money grew on trees I would probably eat here every day.

Although with the same delicious healthy food, this location's service is beyond subpar, standing in queue for more than 10 mins without staff acknowledging your presence.  Not a "welcome" nor "I'll be right with you". Meanwhile the only server/cashier/runner runs around catering to all other dine in guests with other queuing guests looking at each other like "should I say something?"...   after the previously o it server/cashier/runner serviced all the queuing guests 2 other staff emerge from back of house to say hello to guests... seems to me the location is lacking management... great food however, don't think I'll dine here

The wait time is absolutely unbearable. It took almost 15 minutes for my smoothie to be made. 

It wasn't even mediocre...the fruit did not taste ripe and the smoothie had a disgusting bitter taste to it. 

I was running late for an appointment so I didn't even taste my smoothie until I was half way there and I was so disappointed I wasted $8 on it. 

I did get a burger there before my smoothie mishap and it was good...Took awhile but I enjoyed it.
The juices are insanely good. I got the Wellness and the Antioxidant one today as I'm fighting a cold and my word, they were superb.

I like this place. Fun healthy meals with good service. The BBQ pizza on the lavash crust is my favorite. I follow flexible dieting so I love how they list the macros so I can track my food. This is a new location and they play awesome reggae music at night. The vibe is good and the atmosphere is warm and inviting. Close to my house and the gym this place is my go to for that post work dinner. Steve was great and very helpful and polite

I love this place. The breakfast is so yummy I questioned if it was really good for you but it is. Love the Bison Burger as well as all of their soups. The staff is beyond amazing and helpful! Highly recommend.
Loved their other locations, now I have one easy to get to from my house. Bison cheese steak in a cabbage wrap is to die for

I was super excited to drive by here last week and saw that they opened a location near me. We have eaten at the Henderson location and fell in love with the food and smoothies there. My husband usually gets the Green Shake and this time I got the Antioxidant Chiller and it has become my favorite. Our favorite food to get is the Bison Burger. The meat is juicy and every bite is delicious. It comes with either jicama fries or tofu fries. We are not jicama fans so we get the tofu fries and they are yummy.

Delicious real food.  I have gotten take out here a couple times and the food quality and freshness is high.  The tofu fries and tofu croutons in the salads are amazing.  The Ahi protein salad is very filling and the citrus dressing is so good.  Definitely recommend.

Jump on the train!  Eat healthy!  This new place is located within walking distance of my office, and when I'm there (which is almost never) I head over for lunch.  Great salads, and even better juices, with a friendly staff and a casual atmosphere.  I always feel weird about leaving dirty dishes on a table in a fast casual restaurant like this, but I'm warming to the idea.  Summer Berry Spinach Salad, Harvest Kale Stocked Salad, and Bison Cheese Steak are current faves.  Try a Wellness Drink or a Green Ginger Limeade, and you too will be a happy, healthy human!

This place is exactly what the world needs!! Why isn't there one of these on every corner like Starbucks.

This place has a full kitchen of all organic amazing foods and has a full juice and smoothie bar to boot.

When you walk in the door you initially think it's just a juice and smoothie bar and then you take your first breath and realize that smell is intoxicating. You order right there at the counter for the smoothie and the juice bar. Everything is extremely fresh and made to order. So if you want to get a smoothie and someone you're with it wants to grab lunch this is the perfect place to be. There is a pretty simple area to sit and had your lunch, which they bring out to you! Awesome! However the food is a bit on the pricey side. But the quality is worth every penny.

I would beg and plead Reno to open one at home, but I guess until then I'll have to frequent the few locations they have an Vegas.

I recently men's this to greens AND protein lovers alike.

Great food!

Green Veggichino is the best Frappuccino replacement.  Everyone here is friendly, and very knowledgeable of the menu.  Lots to choose from!  It may be quicker to call in your order, depending on the food you get..It may take a little while.

I eat here all the time! If I could everyday, I would! The staff is always so helpful and friendly. The BYO(Build Your Own - Protein, grains, Vegetable and Sauce) is my go-to! It's always fresh and a great size meal/proportions for the price, dinner or lunch. Their juices and smoothies are delicious as well. Highly recommend for clean eating!
Turkey burger with sweet potato fries at least once a week! We've tried a few other items, and all were good too. Service is always quick and employees are always smiling :)

This is my go to place to eat when I'm in Vegas. I love the healthy choices and what a variety there is! If you're in the mood for Acai bowls, French toast, pizza, burgers or salad this place has it all. It also has juices. The free cucumber water is delicious too. The options are many and the healthful benefits are great too. There are many gluten free options and organic choices. I never thought eating so healthy could taste so good! I love this place more than Swamis in California where I live.

Lately I've noticed myself going here at least once a week. I eat extremely healthy and when I'm itching for a cheat meal I come here. Still healthy but just naughty enough to satisfy that burger craving. And if I choose for my cheat meal to be a burger it needs to be their bison burger.. always satisfies and cooked perfectly. The customer service is great!
Excellent food and great service.  Have had it to go a few times.  First time eating at restaurant,  and impressed by the accommodating attitude. Real can do people.
I had the wellness juice and the turkey wrap and was surprised at how delicious it was! Very flavorful appetizing and delicious, but healthy as well. A win win!

I am not from the Las Vegas area, but every time I do get in to the area, I make sure to get a meal from Greens and Proteins. I found this out-of-state gem after my first day at EDC. The catch here though is the price. Good, quality, food comes at a premium. If you're not willing to spend money on the best that your body should have, then this is not the place for you.

The restaurants are well maintained, their flavored water is fresh and always hits the spot. I had their BBQ chicken pizza, an Acai bowl, and one of their wellness shakes. Delicious.

I've been trying to figure out a factor that I consider when reviewing places and finally remembered: approachable. 

I'm a foodie so in turn I'm also a fatty. Not to say all foodies are, but I am.

I've wanted to try one of these health driven food places and decided on Greens & Proteins and the staff definitely made my visit. They were taking dine in orders when they were closing in 10 minutes. That's awesome. Disclaimer: I wasn't the jerk coming in 10 minutes before closing: I was leaving.

I tried their famous tofu fries with special dipping sauce and a bowl of turkey chili that night.

The first thing that popped in my head was how big the portions were. $5 for 12 tofu fries and $5-$7 for a giant bowl of chili. I took my leftover soup home and it legit filled the take out cup. The chili was the perfect balance of being unique, healthy, and tasty. After I was done I felt fine full but in a pleasant way as the soup wasn't loaded with sodium as most soups tend to be. 

With all that said this fatty felt like this place was approachable. They have a lot of similar items on their menus as other healthy casual dining places in the Vegas valley like wraps, juices, smoothies, and grilled chicken. They also have some stuff that someone who wasn't eating a healthy diet would find appealing.

The prices are affordable, really clean, friendly staff, plenty of seating- I dig it.

I just love this place! It's within walking distance of my office, which makes it super convenient, so naturally, I am here quite a bit. Without fail, Daniel always welcomes me with the happiest most genuine attitude. Today, Maria took my order and it was not the standard order, in fact I just needed salad dressing because I packed a salad for lunch today and forgot the dressing. (Stupid Monday's!)
Anyway, I told Maria to just charge me whatever I needed to be charged and I guess because I'm such a regular here they were just going to give me the dressing for free. Of course, I do not like to take anything for free so I purchased a fabulous ginger green limeade:)))) mmmmm!!!! 
So then... As I was leaving, I started typing this review and oblivious me, I left my wallet on one of the tables! The staff (John and Daniel) knew the company I worked for and they went completely out of their way to call me!!! 
Just amazing people all around and I can't say enough good things about them!!

Simply delicious food. I had the salmon, asparagus and quinoa paired with the lemon vinaigrette... Perfection. Salmon was really well cooked, the vinaigrette was light and refreshing.  

Staff was super friendly. I was so stoked to hear they also have a location right near my apartment. This will become a regular spot!

When I actually do have the funds to splurge on a healthy meal, I choose this place.

They have a pretty healthy and diverse menu, so I'm sure you'll find something to meet your cravings. My go-to option is the Create Your Own Meal. This allows you to choose one protein, one green, one grain, and one dressing. Let your imagination run wild here. This is the perfect opportunity to meet that delicious, healthy craving you've been having.

My favorite selections for the Create Your Own Meal is salmon, asparagus, brown rice, and the lemon citrus dressing. I'll have to force myself to try the other proteins one day, but I'm always craving for salmon whenever I eat here. There's a light crust on the salmon, but the inside cuts up perfectly! The brown rice is the perfect texture - squishy, but NOT watery. The asparagus is prepared just how I like it - not burnt, but thoroughly cooked.

I really wish I had the funds to eat here everyday, but it can get pricey. This place is the perfect solution to eat healthy when you're too lazy to to make your own meal, but have the currency to splurge a little.

The workers are always energetic and welcoming! It's really a different environment when people actually like being there. 

I always order the bbq chicken pizza since I feel less... Guilty. LOL it says it's healthy so it must be, right? But honestly, their bbq chicken pizza is amazing!! I've also tried their chicken quinoa salad or something like that & that was also really good! 

The cucumber water is also a nice touch! Very refreshing!

I have heard so many good things about this place and finally tried a wrap and their hummus and pita to-go. The California grilled chicken wrap, although kind of pricey, was huge and delicious. I had to save half of it cause it was so stuffed with veggies and grilled chicken. The tofu fries that came with my sandwich were to die for! They were very flavorful with just the right amount of spice and seasoning and came with a yummy chipotle sauce! The hummus was a little bland, but still fresh and hearty. I will definitely be back to try more dishes!

I like that most of the menu items have the calories listed. Calories for tofu fries vs. jicama "fries" were not listed, but the helpful person at the counter was able to tell me. Nice, helpful employees. I got an extra lean angus beef burger, and it was delicious. I always enjoy having a healthier option. Certainly not cheap though.

My wife and I eat at Greens and Proteins a lot, at this location and the one on West Flamingo.  The food is good and the people seem to always be nice.  My complaint is that when you submit an order on their app and you go to pick it up, it's never ready and sometimes not even started.  Then they tell you it will be ready soon.  So you sit in the dining area and wait...and wait...and wait and then you go to the counter to get your food that's been sitting there for who knows how long.  They don't call out your name or come and find you in the dining area.  This has happened to me or my wife several times but only at the Rainbow location.  We use the app to save time and make it easier but this location seems to not value our time.  We'll go to the other locations until this one figures it out.
Absolutely delicious. I had the veggie burger and was blown away. Helpful and friendly staff.

Was amazed to find such a place on my visit to Vegas. And it was something that everyone I was traveling with liked too. My only complain was that there was only one trash can ( at the back of restaurant. Which for someone to clear their table made it a pain) it was a bit on the pricy side. But heathy is hard to find.

Would have gotten 5 stars if the guy at the register didn't mess up my meal. He charged me twice for a build your own meal. I called and noticed the charge, and he told me to come in next time so he can take care of it. When I came in, I asked to have my meal he said he was gna take care of, and I added a 6 dollar soup. He charged me for my whole meal and told me soup was taken care of. No you moron, as a courtesy of good customer service for messing up my meal before, you should take care of my 12 dollar meal. And I'll pay for my 6 dollar soup separately. Idiot.

This will be my third time here. The service here is phenomenal! Also the service is very fast the manu is amazing with all the healthy choices and very tasty, and fresh! satisfied customers definitely always a choice to return.

During the fall, I will go slightly out of my way to step on a crunchy-looking leaf. Similarly, when I'm looking for healthy eats, I will go out of my way to come to this G&P location over the one by 215 and Flamingo- better product and service all the way around, totally redeemed the brand after my dismal visits to the other location!

Menu is packed with healthy options and every single item has the macros listed: calories, carbs, fats, and proteins, making my life so much easier. Standout items include any/all of the salads (particularly the ahi), and my guy digs the ostrich burger (don't forget the bbq sauce!). Love how you can customize everything, whether adding products to the shakes or ingredients to the salads (the tofu is perfect) or opting for a gluten free bun or cabbage wrap for your burgers/sandwiches. 

Location never seems to get too busy but is conveniently located. Staff are attentive, outgoing, and genuinely nice guys happy to make recommendations. Going to try the protein pancakes next!

Love this place, great options for fitness and healthy conscious people like my self, there is always something that will help you fulfill your macros.  The restaurant is cute and the staff is always helpful and friendly
The chocolate penutbutter banana  smoothie is so delicious definitely my favorite, also best ahi protein salad. Love this place right after the gym.

I love this place!!!! The bison cheese steak is A+++ I wanted to try other menu item,but I'm hooked. It's a good portion size for the price. I usually bring one half home for later. I highly recommend the antioxidant chiller as well it's delicious!!

I had high expectation traveled 10 minutes in taxi there n back $30 round trip wasn't worth it at all- staff were nice smoothies good food disgusting left feeling yuck.
Won't be returning.

My husband and I stopped in at 9:40 after a long flight. We expected to be rushed since they closed at ten, but the customer service was on point. The food was amazing, and they were incredibly welcoming. There was no rushing at all. We were still out by ten, but the fact that they didn't shoot attitude or rush us was a pleasant surprise. We will definitely be back. 

**i highly recommend the bison cheesesteak - it's awesome!
Love this place ! I will be back . The service was outstanding and welcoming I left feeing satisfied

I got the green shake and hummus and pita. The shake was good. Not great, but good. I'd get it again for sure. The pita came out and looked really tasty. I was very hungry so I dug in right away. There was two flavors of hummus, plain and maybe red pepper? They were both super bland. No flavor whatsoever and a weird consistency. Not smooth and yummy but kind of dry and grainy. A little olive oil was drizzled on top but even that didn't give it any flavor. Don't be afraid of garlic and spices!! A little salt and pepper even? Idk, I might come back for a smoothie but I doubt I'll try the food again.

I love the other greens and protein. I even gave the one on Eastern 5 stars for their amazing customer service and food. I went to the new one on rainbow yesterday and it was weird. The server was very nice, but was having difficulty using their new system. Even the other person working seemed to find it confusing. It was pretty dead inside which is unusual for a Greens and Protein, but our food took forever. We didn't even get an acknowledgement or an apology for it taking so long. I believe the other people that were there might have known the owners or managers because kids of theirs were running around and going in and out of the back room. Also, a dog was barking. We couldn't tell if it was from the back office or kitchen, but we're hoping it wasn't the kitchen. The food was still great, but everything else made me uncomfortable.

This place is great when you want to eat out, but still want to eat right! Just went with some clients and I'm sure happy we decided to go here. The tofu fries are a great choice, but anyting in thus menu is great. Make sure to try one of their green drinks!!

So glad that this has opened up near our house. We used to go to the other locations a few times but they were a bit far away. Now that this has opened, we are visiting at least once a week, to work our way through the menu. The tofu fries are the best, and the salads are huge!! Perfect for hungry people like me and my husband!

Daniel, the general manager, is such a delightful person. He was extremely patient and helpful with explaining and recommending options on the menu. It was my first time at Greens & Proteins, and the food is fantastic. I ordered the green shake and a BBQ chicken pizza (square) - super thin crust and vegan cheese. I highly recommend this place. I wish there was a location in Irvine or Los Angeles, CA. I highly recommend this place

Healthy, healthy, healthy!

The staff is very friendly, knowledgeable and seem to care about their food too. The overall place is clean and the vibe is welcoming and inviting. Food is of great quality. Thus, the slightly higher prices. I will follow up with a more detailed review later of my meal but for now I will keep things short and say simply this is a 5 star place for me!

Today my sister and I tried this plate, it was absolutely amazing. Customer service was great, and so was the food. When stevo, the cashier noticed that we didn't eat all the tofu, he brought us out different options of foods to try without us even asking! And then when we were ready to leave, he rushed over to the door and opened it for us. A1 customer service and food!
I'll update my review just because I like the food and it's very convenient to order it there.

Wow, this place will make you like food you never thought you could.

I ordered the raw "Nachos"  and a Lime and Ginger smoothie.  Both were excellent.

The place is very clean and serene, and for what they are serving, it's perfectly priced.

Highly Recommended!  We'll be back!

So after multiple check ins I finally decided to write a review. . .yeah yeah. . .we can all get lazy sometimes.  LOL

This last check in. . .I actaully tried their food for the first time.  Every other time that I have gone, I got smoothies.  More on them later. . .

I got their daily special of Turkey chili with cannellini beans.  TBH, I got it cuz it was warm and I was actually cold that day. . .LOL  But I gotta give them props. . .if you had not told me that it was "healthy" I would never had thought that it was.  It was freaking delicious!  The mouth feel was just like a meaty chili, flavor had just the small amount of heat that just made you want to take another bite.  It came with some lavash which added some great crunch to the dish.  I would go back just for this dish.  It was that good!!  And to think that it was acutally healthy for me. . .*gasp*  LOL  (5/5)

The second dish was kind of a fail for me.  I love chicken lettuce wraps and I order their "RAW cashew" chicken lettucs wraps.  The look of it was cute.  They served it on little butter lettuce leaves with a little micro greens on top.  The flavor was NOT like a chicken lettuce wrap.  The Texture was NOT like a chicken lettuce wrap. . .and like a dummy I didn't realize until that I bit into that it was a "RAW" food which meant that nothing was heated.  So it was a cold mealy scoop of cashews mixed with something on a lettuce cup.  I DO NOT reccomend.  Unless you are totally into RAW foods. . .I am guessing if I was that I might have liked it??  I honestly don't know what I was expecting BUT I was thinking with the words chicken lettuce wrap in it that it would feel like chicken and taste like a traditional lettuce wrap in my mouth?? (1/5)

Service. . .ALWAYS impeccable!  (5/5)

Smoothies. . .including the veggiechino. . .yes u read that right. . .a vegetable smoothie with espresso in it. . .OMG DELICIOUS!!!  (5/5)

Overall, heck yeah I am going back. . .BUT next time I will definitely skip the RAW foods section. . .lesson learned!  =)
Amazing place...healthy shouldn't taste this good! The staff was very friendly and explained all the small details I needed to make the best dining choice I have made in a while...keeper!

Still one of my favorite places to go when I'm visiting Vegas. I always get the Wellness Drink without Stevia. It's sweet enough with the fruit that you can't taste the greens. If you check in on yelp you get $1 a juice or smoothie. The person who helped us out...Steve? was great. Very personable and gave great recommendations.

Still waiting for this place to come out to LA!

The atmosphere is like a cafe sit down area with open windows. Choose between a large selection of healthy breakast items , lunch or dinner. I went at breakfast loved the greek scramble, a bit bummed on just black coffee no creamer or substitute for creamer but they have a nice selection of special caffeine and non caffeine drinks. My husband got the burrito and enjoyed it with a peanut butter bananna smoothie shocker he couldent taste the kale or spinach in it thats a bonus for him. My daughter enjoyed a turkey burger. Overall great food will definitely be back.

Came here for the first time a few days ago & I was pleasantly surprised! First off, love the bright green colorful decor. It has a fresh feel to it. I was greeted by a bunch of smiling, happy associates. Props to the manager because everyone had a great attitude. The young guy Alex at the register had great recommendations and I told him to "take the wheel" and order something he thought I would enjoy.. and boy did I! He set me up with a Bison Wrap and some sweet potato fries. It was delish, mad props to Alex for the hook-up. Ambiance is nice; lots of people on work breaks or fresh out of the gym, chatting happily over their meals. 
I will definitely be back soon!

"Healthy Food" is such a trend so I feel most places just make anything healthy and it'll be popular. The food is very bland, the hummus is horrible. So dry and flavorless please avoid. The chicken satay is yummy "the peanut sauce" on it is healthy and good. As for everything else I don't think healthy has to mean lacking flavor, and spice. This place is alright wouldn't recommend anyone to come here.

I have been meaning too get this off my bookmark tonight finally did. I always heard about the location on the opposite end of world for me. Once learned about there newest location excited about chance too get my Greens and Proteins on. I no means hardcore comes too healthy eating but generally try all my meals healthy. Truly is no place better in Vegas comes too healthy menu. Literally they breakdown the calories on just about every menu item. Offer Build Your Own Custom Meal pick your proteins, greens, grains, and sauces. Again they have everything broken down too calories. It was my first time daunting too pick choose as my first taste. I kind of in the mood of burger so went with the Ostrich Burger and try so got the 7 Vegetable Broccoli Cheese Soup. 

The soup was good. It nothing Wow factor but overall solid soup. It nice creamy base soup but had nice thickness and full body with the cheese (assume cheddar they use. The color really nice. Times order any vegetable soup not have that vibrant or look like vegetable. Soup was right on. Nice HOT!!

The Ostrich Burger was delicious. I believe one first times having it. It lean meat. So thinking might be dried out but still moist and had nice flavor. The garnishes of lettuce and tomatoes really fresh looking added too my burger. The sides lot too choose from but went with the fried tofu. I scared at first. I enjoy tofu but not seasoned right just bland. The fried tofu was hit for me. It had nice seasonings on the outside and enjoy the aioli dipping sauce for them. They also offer Bison as protein. I see that in my future...

They cook everything too order so takes time but very much worth the wait. The only thing not fan of is the interior is REALLY boring. I understand still relatively new but plain white walls all around and not much of vibe inside. It loses appeal waiting but once you get your food more then MAKES up for it. It kind of pricey menu. Still not going too hold me back try more of the menu.
Courteous staff and an owner who "loves" food.  Food that is both delicious and nutritious
great food, great smoothies, I would also recommend breakfast there...tofu served like country potatoes is quite taste.  Only does side would be the prices. $$$

I looooove the loaded antioxidant chiller juice! It's my absolute faaav one! I also love the get the tofu fries and the summer berry salad with shrimp! Overall, I recommend! & the cashier is such a cutie with big blue eyes (:

Kale Harvest Salad- 3 star. 
Chicken Quinoa Salad - 3 star. 

Both were delicious. I have had better, but it has a good price point for a healthy place. I must try their pizza next! 

Service - 5 star.
Love G&P-they offer so many choices, they have great juices! The food is full service quality at fast casual prices!! They even have spaghetti squash!! Love the #vegan options!

WOW......this place has an incredible menu !   Unique items not found anywhere else!    A little on the pricey side, but not when you realize how healthy the eats are !  I decided it was well worth the money !  I am now totally addicted to their ginger lime-aid -- like nothing I have ever had !!!   Totally addicted for good !
This place is fantastic. Just great healthy food for a very good price. Most of the juice drinks are great and the bison patties are awesome!

Love the chocolate peanut butter banana smoothie! I tried the buffalo chicken tenders today and was disappointed with how "zesty" it was. I would recommend less citrus as that was the only thing keeping me from enjoying the meal. I loved that it was under 450 calories as well as a nice presentation.
We are from California visiting Las Vegas - the hubby and I we're looking for healthier options and ran into this place.  The food was absolutely delicious!!!

This is a nice place to go if you're looking for something healthy and relatively quick. I had the emu burger, and it was awesome, and the juices were really outstanding. I really like that they post all of the calories on the menu so you know what's in your food. The con, it's really quite pricey, 6+ $ for smoothies/drinks, and sandwiches start at about 10$. It would be easy to have a 25$ lunch by yourself here. Noticed they are however vegan, vegetarian and HCG diet friendly.

I went here for the first time this morning and I loved it. I ordered the Watermelon Strawberry Cocktail. Its delicious. The pricing is not too bad considering everything is healthy. The smoothie I'm drinking is 215 calories. Everything shows how much you're intake is. The staff is really friendly and the place is so clean. There is outdoor dining as well.
Tons of options The food actually tasted like food, which is a lot more than I can say for Rachel's Kitchen. Also the green drink is good, looks weird though

great vegan breakfast burrito.  great juices.  I used a groupon here.  Lady at register was very friendly.  I enjoy these style restaurants more than traditional sit down.  Pay up front and they still bring it to you.  little bit pricey but worth it.

I've been here a couple of times, and the service is always friendly! I have a ridiculous amount of food allergies to watch for, and they're always willing to check labels for me or answer any questions. I like the build your own meal option, but it can be a little pricey depending on what you order. Usually, I order the Angus burger wrapped in lettuce with vegan cheese. Comes out to about $12 with tax, which is reasonable considering the quality of the beef. Also, I love being able to use those substitutes!! The only bummer is the sides they have to choose from ..no soy allowed, so I can't  have tofu fries, and the jicama fries taste like raw potato to me.  Only other option is a vegetable, but honestly? Broccoli with a burger isn't the best. Still giving them a good rating because of the staff, though. Keep it up guys!!

A "healthy" spot, conveniently located nearby an LVAC on the 215 and Flamingo, it provides a great place to go get some post work out food. They provide a great variety of what would be considered health foods and healthy shakes. Something I would recommend is their bison cheesesteak. It would be a favorite among anyone that tries it, and a favorite among customers. You can make your own meal, so you can try many different combinations of food and try things here that you wouldn't have otherwise. The only downside to m is the pricetag, it can be a little pricy, but this hits a specific niche of people that will spend the money to eat at a place like this. You may not enjoy the price, but you definitely will enjoy the food!

It's always good to eat healthy every now and then. They post the # of calories for their items. It is pricey so make sure you're willing to fork out the money for the healthy food. 

They've also got pizza which was surprising for me. Gonna have to recommend the BBQ pizza one. The others don't sound appetizing to me personally. 

If you order their drinks, grab the epoxy app so you can get their virtual stamp card. Cashier told me their Wellness Drink was the most popular. It's pretty good - if you like grapes. 

My favorite has got to be their tofu fries! I always try to get an extra order to go :0). 

I've been here a few times and there are times where the food is bleh (depending on what you order) and other times they're decent. Aside from the tofu fries, nothing else has stood out to me so just give yourself a few visits to try various stuff.

The turkey club sandwich also wasn't too shabby. But it's definitely better than eating at Sweet Tomatoes every time I want something healthy.

Taste: 3
Creativity/Authenticity: 3.5
Atmosphere: 3
Service: 3.5
Bang for your buck: 4

I want to like this place but def still looking for other options. Came here with my gf cause she was in the mood for healthy and light got the bison wrap with tofu fries and the broccoli and cheese soup... lets start with the soup i know healthy places are known for bland food because sodium is a big factor when it comes to health but a nice little packet of salt which the supply and this soup was edible. Now the bison wrap, not bad, not great nothing special. The bison was again no flavor but noted this is a health food spot so understandable some sauce they provided made the wrap taste better and i ate it just fine. Now my main problem the "TOFU FRIES"; if you like this you might as well eat cardboard probably taste better and better for you, this was horrible the texture and flavor was like processed plastic?! ive had similar tofu fries before and they were way better than this, def recommend trying the napkins. Overall i get where this place is going and not being a health nut i cant really complain i just wont eat here and let my gf enjoy it.

yummy! I love this place! Sadly, my husband is not into it as much as I am so I can only go there by myself...or when I force him to go with me :) Yeah some of the stuff are not as tasty as others. Learn what you like from the menu and then you will be just fine.

If your a 110 lbs women or not very hungry this might be the place for you , if you don't mind paying $12 for a sub mediocre salad leaving hungry ,this might be the place for you as well .  I'm not either .  I went there after working out and I was starving, i figured I'd have a nice healthy salad. I ordered the large Albacore Salad , the guy at the front said it was good ,  when I opened it I almost peed my pants , it was 5 pieces of bibb lettuce , 2 cherry tomato's , a scoop of canned tuna and Dijon mustard (not mustard dressing) this was the large too , 
Generally I like to go to a place more then once to give an open minded review, but I'm not sure if I could bring myself back to give it another chance. The Daily Wellness is a much better place !

Wow! I was in town and wanted a healthy meal. I came here based on the reviews. I was not disappointed. The salmon was super fresh and delicious and the salad was amazing. I ordered the lemon vinaigrette on the side and it was tasty.

Sometimes after a healthy meal I am hungry quick. This meal had enough spice and seasoning to make me feel full longer.
Wellness drink my absolute fav!!! I tried the veggie burger & although it is made fresh...it was a little dry. Needs some hummus or some type of cilantro pesto something....overall I'm a fan!

The smoothies are delicious! Customer service is good and the food is passable. Although, my boyfriend ordered the Buffalo Chicken Strips and the sauce was a little too spicy. I also preferred more berries on the Summer Berry Salad I ordered. (But), regardless of our personal preference on the food, it was well worth the money we spent. I will definitely return.

Today is Monday, March 21, 2016 and I have NEVER left a yelp review positive or NEGATIVE however, the chain events that I went through at this one Greens and Proteins I felt compelled to. I called from the parking lot, using my bluetooth, to place a to-go order, I was at the Lifetime fitness on Charleston and just finished my workout (11:45 am). Immediately I was asked if it was okay to put me on a brief hold. I was on hold for over 10 minutes, and by the time they picked up again I was standing right in front of the cashier. She seem annoyed at ME, which is ridiculous because it should be the other way around, and she said, "our phones are not working properly." I placed my tuna salad and chicken quinoa salad and the cashier said in a condescending tone, "well at least you do not have to wait long for your order because you are ordering salads." $19.00 + dollars and on top of it I tipped them 2.00 (which I should have not had I known what other crap I had to endure). Had it not been for the Seven magazine I was reading to occupy my time, I realized 15 minutes had passed and those who ordered after me were already eating or have left. I looked into the kitchen and the two cashiers were talking and "looking busy." I see my salad order just sitting on the counter in the kitchen. I loudly say, "Is that my salad order I have been waiting for?" They looked at me as if I am the one being rude and look at the order like it appeared there magically. Since my husband had already had lunch he said he would eat the quinoa salad for dinner. I just got a call from him at 7:30 pm and he said there was GLASS in his salad. I called to inform this location what we had been through. Of course it is not the evening shifts fault and Priscilla, the supervisor I spoke to apologized and offered to buy us new meals but that is not what I want because I am NEVER going to this place again. The Greens and Proteins on Rainbow is closer to me and I usually go there. This was my second and LAST time going to the Flamingo location. If you decide to patronize this venue, be aware and cautious.

I like the idea of healthy food as an alternative to the usual fast food fair, but they always take so long and the food is just not that good. I like the menu but I feel like they could add a bit more flavor. The healthy food I make at home tastes good, their food is quite bland.

The fact that I can eat an ENTIRE Gluten Free pizza and KNOW the Macros is amazing in itself. The fact that the macros are SO GOOD that I can EASILY fit it in my day even on contest prep is even better!!!! Everything I have had has been AMAZING .. but the fact that they list ALL Macros is what keeps me going back! Thank you for providing this service .. especially for those of us that practice Flexible Dieting! You make dining out easy! Makes me not want to go anywhere else when I want to "eat out" :)
this place is a little pricey, but everything is healthy and fresh. cant go wrong with the Wellness Drink as a post workout!

Recently went here for lunch before an afternoon yoga class and was pleasantly surprised. I had heard the food was pricey, which it is a bit more compared to the norm, but the portions are large & the food is delicious. I had the turkey club wrap with tofu fries. The fries were crisp and unique and the wrap was great too. They also offer complimentary cucumber lemon water. I would highly recommend this place for anyone looking to stay fit, but still eat deliciously.

We were greeted by store manager Mark. It is Black Friday & was not too busy here which was great. Mark was very informative. Burger was hot & fresh.  Nice establishment, having the antioxidant drink now. It is really tasty.

Tasty, healthy, servin' it up with love little cafe that specializes in hi protein homemade food.

Filled with gym-bunnies eating after the work-out, definitely keeping their trainers and diets happy!

The menu looks simple from fist appearances, but they really try to get creative with the flavors, and foods. For example, instead of potatoes, yummy little tofu bites. Over all I was impressed.

Wow...A new location and all reviews are 5 Stars.  Albeit only 3 reviews, this is a new location on the Westside (i.e. the best side, throwing up the W!!).  If you read my review of the Eastern location, I too gave them 5 stars.  However, it's easy to dismiss these posts as biased ones since there is so little reviews.  I had to investigate because that's what I do.   

I am a fan of Greens & Proteins and one complaint about them is price.  Most of the items on the menu are pricey and to be honest, don't have much taste either.  Keep in mind, G&P is healthy and that includes you to have an healthy wallet. I'm not a baller by any means, but will splurge when quality proteins is what my body needs.  I also use to have food delivered to my home via "Eat to Grow".  This was pricey too and taste is only for the desirable.  I made my biggest gains on these meals and G&P is no different. 

I've tried their Salmon and Ostrich Burgers in the past.  At this location, I opted to try their Turkey.  You get 8 oz of clean protein and less fat with their Turkey Burger.  This meal is also served with their Jicama fries.  The turkey was pretty good, but the fries is something that made it into the basura with the quickness. After Lent, I will definitely come back for their Filet Mignon.  

I gave the other location 5 stars, but had to drop this location to 4 stars.  This G&P is more spacious, but missing that ambiance that the Eastern location has. Great people watching at the Eastern location.  Because this location is new, the staff is also new.  Knowledge is power and a newbie staff can mean weakness.  When I order at places like this, I like to know how much the servings are like protein count, total ounces, etc.  The staff actually had to go to the back and ask.  They also didn't know if they served fat-free ranch.  I know, I'm just getting picky but these are the things most health driven restaurants would know.  I'm sure by the next visit, they'll be more prepared. Thus, I will probably up their rating back to 5 stars. 

Still a fan of Greens and Protein.  Don't be surprised if you see multiple check in's from me at this joint.  This is a new and more spacious location.  I'm sure within the next couple of months, the word will be out and the ambiance will mimic what the Eastern location provides.

Love love love this place!!! Its the perfect place to start eating healthier and transitioning yourself into a healthier lifestyle. My "go to" is a create your own, where u pick a protein, a green, a grain, & a sauce. If I'm splurging I go with the gluten free BBQ chicken pizza. I myself have Celiac disease (gluten intolerance) and have to be very picky about where & what I eat; its nice that the staff is well educated on which items, including sauces & dressing, fit my food requirements. Also, staff is very friendly! Can't wait to see this place grow more and more popular!

I've been here a few times. The first time I found something on my burger and when I told the manager he took care of me. I appreciated the good customer service. Their pizza is good and so is the angus burger. Smoothies are healthy and a nice size, but overall the food is expensive. I'm ok with paying for good quality if the ingredients are healthy, just can't come here too often. I appreciate them showing the calorie count!!

Multigrain pancakes are delicious (although I don't use the agave syrup I use organic maple at home lol) and the breakfast burrito is also delicious. Pretty much everything I've tried is great... Except jicama fries  I highly recommend and love this place!!

Came here around 1030 in the morning to grab lunch on my way to work. I ordered the turkey club sandwich with turkey bacon and it took 15 minutes, there was literally one other person in the restaurant  I dont know if 15 minutes was really effecient for a 98% cold sandwich but fresh somehow translates to slow service. Ive heard the smoothies are great and several people came in while I was waiting and got their smoothies and were gone. Maybe Ill try one in the future but the sandwich was underwhelming and not worth a $9 price tag.

this place used to be able to get away with the long wait, small menu, and outlandishly high prices but now it's no longer the only healthy, quick eatery in vegas. 
they have a few standouts on their menu like the satay or smoothies but i rarely stop in here anymore with newer additions to the valley like krayvings, protein house, protein source. 
also they don't use organic products the majority of the time

The foods great and It's great to see vegan options on the menu, but recently when I called in my order of a veggiechino smoothie (delicious!) I was told it would be ready in 5 mins, when I got there to pick up my order it wasn't ready and I ended up waiting 20 mins before I left smoothie-less and disappointed. The foods really really great, they just need a little work on their customer service.

I saw this on my way into Zabbas last week and mentally bookmarked this place.  I am always down to try a new place that is supposedly healthy.   Wow, was I surprised.  In the first 48 hours I had eaten here for lunch, dinner and lunch again!

Walking into the place was a little daunting.  This place was so busy that there was literally a line out the door.  All the tables were filled and we were worried we'd have nowhere to sit.  This place is very hectic loud like a high school cafeteria!   The floors are nicely tiled, the tables are high end wood, as are the chairs.  There are booths along a window that, if one can grab, are pretty comfortable to sit at.

The menu consists of Breakfast items (until 11am), Soups, Salads, Pizzas, BURGERS and Wraps/Sandwiches.  Calorie Counts are next to their popular items!  To drink, there is your standard coke fountain with a dedicated dispenser for WATER.  :)

The place is very busy, but still manages to be clean.  There are no trashcans in sight, you just leave your table and the staff quickly cleans up after you.

The first time out I ordered the Ostrich Burger with Swiss Cheese and Tofu Fries.  Despite the cost of being over $15 for my order, it was delicious and I felt it was well worth it.  The burger was a tiny bit dry, but delicious nonetheless.  Burgers come with the standard lettuce, tomato and onion.  The tofu fries were unique.  I wasn't impressed at first but I later realized it was because the fries weren't cooked all the way and it was still squishy in the middle.  This meal I would rate a 8 out of 10.

Later that night I came back again and the place seemed to be less busy.  This time I ordered the Turkey Wrap with bacon and a spinach tortilla and Jicama fries (it's like eating a raw apple sliced up like fries).  Absolutely DELICIOUS!  I loved it - I was very impressed.

On to my next meal here at lunch:  This time I ordered the Bison Burger Swiss cheese, medium rare with Jicama Fries.  The burger was just the right amount of juicy absolutely incredible.   Where else can you eat a burger like this guilt free?  I also ordered a Green Leaf Berry Blast shake with almond milk.  It was very good and satisfied my cravings for fresh fruit.

Be warned, however.  Buying a shake with one of their meals is like eating two meals in one.  I was completely stuffed by the end of my visit.
